item.title: Review Articles in the Realm of Strategic Information Systems
item.content:encoded:
Marco Marabelli, Bentley University

Rohit Nishant, Queen's Business School

Tuure Tuunanen, University of Jyväskylä

Wenyu (Derek) Du, Beihang University

The Journal of Strategic Information Systems dedicates an issue of JSIS each year to review articles in the realm of strategic information systems, broadly defined.

We are now inviting authors to submit review articles for the 2027 Review Issue. Papers should be submitted before 1 September 2025 via JSIS’s online submission portal. Submissions will be evaluated concerning the following criteria: relevance, scope of interest, organization and coherence, insight for future work, timeliness/contribution.

The review article should follow a logical structure, read clearly, and represent extant research in the topic area concerned. It should convey important implications for future research in strategic information systems.

Potential topics

  • High-impact scholarly surveys of important research literatures in the strategic information systems domain
  • Synthesis of recent research and future inquiries
  • Established and emerging topics in strategic information systems
  • Research methods relevant to the context of strategic information systems

Timeline

  • September 1, 2025: Full draft of paper due
  • September 1, 2027: Special issue published
